programme.desc: BRAVO targets a factory in Myanmar that the DEA has tied to China and fentanyl production. Lieutenant Davis wants the team to pull intel and destroy the plant. Jason vies for a safer plan, and some on the team begin to question his decisions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint the old library. They enlist master painter Sylvester who faces his fear of heights with his build buddy, Tweety.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Boxer Porky cant lose with Daffy in his corner. Yosemite Sam stands to become king if he can pull the sword from the stone or just steal it from Bugs Bunny.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her oneeyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Beyblade X

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When their neighbour tries to bring over a package for them, Gumball and Darwin realise they have never learned his name, and its way too late to ask. They try everything to figure out what it is, but when they do they find out there are bigger secrets to learn about their neighbour than just his name...

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week, we explore why Afrodescendants from the Americas and beyond, are choosing to leave their lives in the West to return to their ancestral Africa. We meet a single mother who traded life in Canada for a fresh start in Kenya and a filmmaker who returned to her roots in Sierra Leone. In Ghana, we hear from some of the over 1,000 African Americans now calling it home.

programme.title: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A young author buys the apartment of her dreams, but strange sounds begin to alarm her, along with a feeling of being watched. As she learns the history of the apartment, she uncovers a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Disappearance In Yellowstone
programme.desc: When Jessies car breaks down in the middle of a national park and her daughter locks herself inside, she heads off to look for help, but returns to her car to discover her daughter has vanished.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1
programme.desc: Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mateattracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs trafficdodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs preydetecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: ROUX DOWN THE RIVER THE THAMES
ROUX DOWN THE RIVER THE THAMES

Ultimate 90s Playlist!
programme.desc: Nothing but the best tracks and ultimate anthems from the 90s.

programme.title: Girl Power Hour!
programme.desc: ZigAZigah! Its all about girl power! Tune in for all the biggest girl power hits from the 90s.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged Duran Duran
programme.desc: MTVs acclaimed acoustic music series showcases the work of todays top artist and introduces the stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest HipHop, R&B, KPop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2015
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2015 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: This episode features business models designed to help Japans hikikomori individuals who have withdrawn from society to socialize, learn, and even find employment.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: After a lifetimes work, dairy farmer Yoshikawa Yuji was diagnosed with cancer and had to retire. As his son takes over the farm, what joys and struggles does he encounter?

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyoe producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyoe artist Sharakus debut work The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two foreigners in Tokyo. Former amateur champion dancer Daga Rutkowska from Poland trains with a paraathlete for a blind dance competition, and Chinese Zhang Ye works for a literary agency.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now its up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motors talent to save the day. Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the bands instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: A sleeping spider squats Rons swing, and he cant take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she cant locate the key...

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isnt easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes ice pops but cant wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island! Blaze and his crew must find the missing pieces of their ship so they can sail home.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Its a headtohead showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle ziplining adventure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. A sea bunny ravages Squidwards garden, but SpongeBob thinks its cute!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Karen gets a computer virus, and its up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: We meet the Action News Team as Lincoln finds himself taken aback by a new crush. Mom and Dad attempt to befriend a doctor to avoid the astronomical medical expenses that come with having 11 children.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission to Secret Shores so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town longer than they anticipated.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mikas mind through a spooky VR video game. Its up to Danger Force to exercise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before theyre all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henrys life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte gets increasingly suspicious about the secrets hes been hiding.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Ninja Turtles are on the run and...alone. Leonardo is a leader but who is he without anyone to lead? Leo now has to stop Bishop and her Mechazoids while trying to save his brothers.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carl takes Rosas chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Fridas fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildrens attention. Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.desc: When the oldoldoldfashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family gettogether, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural oldschool and modern day cool.

programme.title: One Last Thing
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer, a lonely dentist in Florida, is confronted by a figure from the past bringing news that sends him on an eventful and ultimately lifealtering journey of discovery.

Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must work together to unveil the truth behind their isolation. As terrifying events unfold, nothing really is as it seems

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employers mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.desc: Culross was the epicenter for one of the worst witchhunts in European history.

programme.desc: Era Alaska provides aid to a village devastated by heavy flooding.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska S1
programme.desc: An amateur photographer captures floating orbs on camera. UFOs circle a larger, eggshaped mother ship floating high above Anchorage.

programme.desc: The Delta Queen, a historic riverboat, was relocated to Houma, LA for extensive renovations, setting off paranormal activity.

programme.title: LITTORAL
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the worlds most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Gurin under the full moon.

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: LA BELLE VIE
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prts pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m caravan.

programme.title: QUAND LAFRIQUE SAUVA LA FRANCE
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. Brazzaville became the capital of Free France. In these mobilised colonies, an immense desire for independence was coming to life.
